textBeforeTable: Improved Warzone Experience Increases the amount of experience you receive from completing warzones. Advancement This is the section that I was most interested in as an altoholic. Here you have options to increase the rate at which you earn experience with various activities. There are five different categories that you can increase your experience gains from, and each of those five categories has five ranks worth of bonus experience. The bonuses from each rank are cumulative, meaning that their bonuses stack with one another, and you have to purchase the ranks in order. The idea behind this is that you can pick and choose how you want to level each character and you can choose for each character to be different. We’ll see how it all actually plays out in the end, but for right now you need to be aware of that restriction. Legacy Perks 1.3 Are Character-Specific One thing that you must keep in mind with these perks is that they are not unlocked on a global level, instead they are unlocked only for the character that you purchase them with. That applies to all of the 1.3 Legacy perks. As I’ve done with my other Legacy posts, I’m going to give you the scoop on what they do, how they work, and how much you’ll have to pay to get the.
